main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Cedar City, Utah on 30 September 1955, involving one silver object.
interesting points: Four observers witnessed the object, two of which claimed to have a 'mental conversation' with it., The object was described as being the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length., Observers believed the object might be a silvery balloon or blimp., The object claimed to be from Jupiter and promised to revisit the observers in two weeks., The report concludes that the object was possibly a balloon but not an aircraft or astronomical phenomenon.
